entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
